title: Episode 9: The Ghost in the Machine

pages.caption: 8:00 PM — THE BACKLOG. The sorting floor is buried under an ocean of mail. Pure, chaotic, suffocating dread.
THE BEAST SLEEPS — The AFSM100 machine sits silent and dark. A metallic dragon holding its breath.
THE SCRUBS — The night shift arrives. Cocky, energetics, and completely oblivious to the vibes.
*CLICK* — A single gear moves in the silence. The predator is waking up.
THE AFSM100 AWAKENS — The machine ROARS to life. Shadow letters fly through the transport belts.
TRAPPED — A mechanical diverter arm snags a scrub. The machine is hungry.
THE SORTER WRAITH — A horizontal nightmare manifested from belts and ink. Its OCR sensor glows red.
THE COLLECTION STRIKE — A Permanent Collection seal is burned into the floor. Seals the fate of the workers.
STAN'S WARNING — At home, Stan knows. The Arrow Key is vibrating. 'The backlog is back...'
THE BEAST SHADOW — A simple blue mailbox casts a monstrous silhouette. Darkness is consuming the light.
TO BE CONTINUED — A single letter for 'THE SURVIVORS'. Return address: 'THE PERMANENT COLLECTION'.
